Articles.Content: Hello,I'm sick (but not very much). And I'll be home until official holidays,that means - from today - 7th January. What should I do ?
Don't forget to turn on Twitch when you do. And be entertaining!
Take craft requests and upload files for people. Or make up a bunch of SubAssemblies and upload them.
Listen to loud music and dance like an idiot.
Try to land on every planet/moon in kerbal space program.
Try to reach c using only ant engines and no infi fuel.
Everyone here is suggesting things KSP related :/ Except you, astropapi, good job!
Stay hydrated and play video games. Always worked for me.

I usually play simple, repetitive games like Civilization 5 or RCT2 while listening to George Carlin or whatever comedian or music I'm in the mood for. I usually like to clean up my harddrive when I'm sick too.
Sounds fun. By the way, how is Kerbal the kitten doing. And the other one... what's his name?

Dont die.

It is what most people do until they don't.

That's quite a long holiday! Maybe you could go stargazing. I really like to look at all the different stars each night, and looking through a telescope makes the experience better. Try looking at venus with binoculars. You will probably be able to see its phase, just like you can with the moon. Merry Christmas and a happy new year!

Sounds fun. By the way, how is Kerbal the kitten doing. And the other one... what's his name?

They are fine thanks, Kerbal's half grown now and young Stumpy has become his best friend.
